Entry.JapaneseText: 食材屋「山の恵み」
Entry.EnglishText: Grocer

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード・宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd - Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Right, the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... She can't talk to me because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that she can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh...the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right, those commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: He isn't allowed to talk to women because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 泊まる 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Rest Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>ひと晩<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが いかがですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay the night?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Will you be spending the night?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>泊まんのかい……？ <unk17:340C80>ガルド置いてきな。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど、 泊まるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>It's <unk17:340C80> Gald for a night. Will you be staying?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど、 泊まる？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 よろしいでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Is that all right with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドになりますが、 お泊りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Would you like to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>一泊<unk17:340C80>ガルドだ。 どうする？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>One night is <unk17:340C80> Gald. Are you staying?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まりますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Will you spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドだけど泊まりますか？
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000002>Will you spend <unk17:340C80> Gald to rest here?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002><unk17:340C80>ガルドで泊りますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><unk17:340C80> Gald to rest. Spend the night? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお寛ぎください。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくりお休みください。
Entry.EnglishText: Enjoy your stay.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうぞ、ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Make yourself at home.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Rest well.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうぞ、ごゆっくり。
Entry.EnglishText: Make yourself at home.

Entry.JapaneseText: ごゆっくり、どーぞー。
Entry.EnglishText: Have a good rest!

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようですね。
Entry.EnglishText: You've got no money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: 金がないのに、 泊まる気だったのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: What, did you think we'd let you stay here without paying?

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないみたいね。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: 泊まり賃をお持ちでないようですが。
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't look like you can afford to stay here.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないようです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ？ お金が足りないみたいだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? You seem to not have enough money.

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りないんじゃが……
Entry.EnglishText: It appears you don't have enough money...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足りませんが……
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have enough money...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金が足らないんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: You don't seem to have enough money...

Entry.JapaneseText: それでは またの機会に。
Entry.EnglishText: See you next time.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ふん…… ひやかしかい……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph... Window-shoppers...

Entry.JapaneseText: またおいで。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back any time.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またおいで。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back any time.

Entry.JapaneseText: またのお越しを。
Entry.EnglishText: We hope to see you again.

Entry.JapaneseText: またお越しください。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、 泊まらないのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: What, you're not going to stay?

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでもどうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: You're always welcome here!

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでもおいで。
Entry.EnglishText: Come back any time.

Entry.JapaneseText: お気をつけて……
Entry.EnglishText: Take care...

Entry.JapaneseText: 泊まらないんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you not want to stay here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが近くにおると どうにも不愉快になるんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't help but feel uncomfortable whenever a Gajuma approaches me...

Entry.JapaneseText: きっと蒼獣様もワシらと 同じ気持ちに違いない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure that the Azure Beast feels the same way.

Entry.JapaneseText: へたに近づいて、蒼獣様を 怒らせるでないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Whatever you do, don't get too close! You'll anger the Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼獣様は、我らヒューマの 守護者じゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Azure Beast is the guardian of us Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもの参拝を 禁止できんもんかのう……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if it's possible to prohibit Gajuma from visiting the shrine...

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜガジュマがここにおる！ さっさと出て行かんか！
Entry.EnglishText: Why is there a Gajuma in my inn?! Get out!

Entry.JapaneseText: 祭司のような重要な仕事は 知に優れたワシらヒューマが やるべきじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: Since we Huma are more intelligent, important jobs such as the priesthood ought to be filled by us.

Entry.JapaneseText: わからん…… ワシには何もわからん……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know... I just don't know anymore...

Entry.JapaneseText: この年になるまで、種族の事など 考えた事もなかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: I never thought much about race until I got to this age...

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんじゃこの音は…… 蒼獣様……お助けを……！
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What is this sound...? Please save us, O Azure Beast...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族の違いがある以上…… それをないものにはできん…… じゃが……
Entry.EnglishText: It is impossible to ignore the differences between races so long as they exist, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: それを知った上で、新しい 関係を築く事が重要なのでは ないか……そう思うんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...knowing that, I feel like it's important to build new relationships...

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼獣様にお参りする時は 必ず風呂に入り、身体を 清めて行くんじゃぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever you visit the Azure Beast, be sure to take a bath to purify your body beforehand.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎度、またどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you, come back again.

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませー。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 食材を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Ingredients Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいちゃんの お手伝いでーす!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm here to help my grandpa!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ヒューマとガジュマの 関係があまりよくないけど、 元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: Relations between Huma and Gajuma aren't going well lately, but everyone's still full of energy!

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでも新鮮な食材で いっぱいです♪ 買っていって？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm always stocked up with the freshest ingredients! Would you like to buy some?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの人がいなくなって、 少し寂しいけど、 元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm a little sad that the Gajuma had to leave, but I'm still full of energy!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのみんなも戻ってきて、 元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: All the Gajuma came back, and they're all full of energy!

Entry.JapaneseText: 騒動も収まって、少しずつ みんなの様子も変わって来ました！ 私もやる気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: Now that that whole kerfuffle is over, everyone seems to have changed. I'm full of motivation too!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音は……蒼獣様のお腹が 鳴ってるんだと思います！
Entry.EnglishText: This sound must be the Azure Beast's tummy rumbling!

Entry.JapaneseText: ウチの食材を食べれば、 きっと蒼獣様も元気いっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: If the Azure Beast were to eat some of the food I sell, I'm sure he'd be full of energy!
Entry.Notes: reworked "Mister Azure beast". Not sure if it's acceptable. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 空が変な色に変わって、 私もいっぱいいっぱいです！ で、でも……営業中です。
Entry.EnglishText: The sky has changed colors and now I'm full of fear! B-But, I'm still open for business.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでも新鮮、 バビログラードの食材屋と いえば、うちだけよ！
Entry.EnglishText: This is the only grocery store in Babilograd. Our food is always fresh!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖殿のおそなえものは うちから出してるの。 イイものいっぱいです！
Entry.EnglishText: We provide offerings for the shrine. We're fully stocked with good stuff!

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいちゃんの お手伝いでーす!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm here to help my grandpa!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃ……あっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Welco... Oh!!
